text: The 2026 FIM MotoGP World Championship will be the premier class of the 78th F.I.M. Road Racing World Championship season. == Teams and riders == Entrant Constructor Chassis Race rider No. Rider Name Aprilia Racing Aprilia RS-GP26 72 Marco Bezzechi TBC TBA Trackhouse Racing MotoGP 25 Raùl Fernández 79 Ai Ogura Ducati Lenovo Team Ducati Desmosedici GP26 63 Francesco Bagnaia 93 Marc Márquez Pertamina Enduro VR46 Racing Team 49 Fabio Di Giannantonio Desmosedici GP25 TBC TBA BK8 Gresini Racing MotoGP 54 Fermín Aldeguer 73 Álex Márquez LCR Honda Castrol Honda RC213V TBC TBA LCR Honda Idemitsu TBC TBA Honda HRC Castrol TBC TBA 36 Joan Mir Red Bull KTM Factory Racing KTM RC16 33 Brad Binder 37 Pedro Acosta Red Bull KTM Tech3 12 Maverick Viñales 23 Enea Bastianini Monster Energy Yamaha MotoGP Yamaha YZR-M1 20 Fabio Quartararo 42 Álex Rins Prima Pramac Racing TBC TBA 88 Miguel Oliveira All teams use series-specified Michelin tyres. ==References== Category:2026 in sports Category:2020s in motorsport Category:Grand Prix motorcycle racing
title: 2026 MotoGP World Championship
